titleStmt.title: The fulness and freeness of Gods grace in Christ declared. Namely, how God orders and appoints men to their final ends; some to honor, some to dishonor to eternity. The second part.
Fulnesse and freenesse of Gods grace in Christ declared. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Duke, Francis.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Newcomb, for John Clark and Miles Mitchel, and are to be sold at their shops in Mercers Chappel, and in Westminster Hall,

notesStmt.note: Epistle to the reader signed: Francis Duke.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
